# Geoff Stearns

> Internet enthusiast & maker of things.

## About

Geoff Stearns makes generative art and builds things on the internet. Creator of SWFObject (used by 2.6M+ websites), ex-YouTube/Google product manager & engineer, and holder of multiple U.S. patents for video player innovations.

## Links

- Artwork: https://deconcept.com/
- Code: https://github.com/tensafefrogs
- Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/deconcept.com
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/tensafefrogs

## This Site

geoffstearns.com is a minimal personal landing page with a custom dot grid pattern background made with pure CSS.
